summary: REQ-1 branding text updates appear implemented in `frontend/index.html` and `frontend/src/App.tsx`. However, the diff does not show the required generated image assets for the new logo and favicon, and it also modifies a constrained hook file (`frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`) which the BuildRequest explicitly forbids editing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a new SUTRA logo image asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (sutra-logo.dim_512x512.png) and use it in the app header in place of the existing icon logo.
missing_requirements.reason: `frontend/src/App.tsx` references `/assets/generated/sutra-logo.dim_512x512.png`, but the diff summary does not show any added image asset file under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (only a non-image JSON file was added). Therefore the required logo asset itself is not evidenced as created/added.
evidence: <file-diff>: ADDED FILES lists only project_state.json; no frontend/public/assets/generated/* entries

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a favicon image under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (sutra-favicon.dim_32x32.png) and update `frontend/index.html` to reference it.
missing_requirements.reason: `frontend/index.html` was updated to reference `/assets/generated/sutra-favicon.dim_32x32.png`, but the diff summary does not show any added favicon image file under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`. Thus the required favicon asset itself is not evidenced as created/added.
evidence: <file-diff>: ADDED FILES lists only project_state.json; no frontend/public/assets/generated/* entries

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts` despite an explicit constraint to not edit this file.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest constraints explicitly forbid editing `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, but it is listed under MODIFIED FILES.
evidence: BuildRequest Constraints: "Do not edit files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`..."

hallucinated_features.description: Added project tracking/state file `project_state.json` unrelated to the requested rename/logo/favicon changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request adding project metadata/state files; this is extra work not tied to REQ-1/2/3.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified/added `frontend-file-summaries.txt`, which is not part of the requested implementation deliverables.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request creating or updating a file summaries document.
